title: The Essential American
description:
More than ever, Americans are realizing that if we want to keep this country great, we must be citizen patriots. And hereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the handbook every citizen patriot needs: The Essential American, featuring the fundamental documents of our nationÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s history.
